  • Classes in org.yamcs.tctm used by org.yamcs 
    Class and Description
    TmSink
    Used by the TmPacketProviders to propagate packets inside Yamcs.
  • Classes in org.yamcs.tctm used by org.yamcs.management 
    Class and Description
    Link
    A sourcce of data into yamcs; Currently TM, TC and Parameter
  • Classes in org.yamcs.tctm used by org.yamcs.simulation 
    Class and Description
    Link
    A sourcce of data into yamcs; Currently TM, TC and Parameter
    Link.Status 
    ParameterDataLink
    Interface for components providing parameters aquired from external systems.
    ParameterSink
    Used by the ParameterDataLink to propagate processed parameters inside Yamcs.
  • Classes in org.yamcs.tctm used by org.yamcs.tctm 
    Class and Description
    AbstractTmDataLink 
    ArchiveTmPacketProvider 
    CcsdsSeqCountFiller
    Fills in the time, seq and checksum
    CommandPostprocessor
    The command post processor is responsible to provide the binary packet that will be send out for a PreparedCommand.
    ErrorDetectionWordCalculator
    Computes the checksum inside the CCSDS packet
    Link
    A sourcce of data into yamcs; Currently TM, TC and Parameter
    Link.Status 
    PacketInputStream
    Interface implemented by the classes that read packets from an input stream.
    PacketPreprocessor
    The packet preprocessor is responsible for extracting basic information required for yamcs packet processing: - packet generation time - packet acquisition time - sequence count It is assumed that the (generation time, sequence count) uniquely identify the packet.
    ParameterDataLink
    Interface for components providing parameters aquired from external systems.
    ParameterSink
    Used by the ParameterDataLink to propagate processed parameters inside Yamcs.
    TcDataLink
    Interface implemented by components that send commands to the outer universe
    TmFileReader
    Plays files in pacts format, hrdp format or containing raw ccsds packets.
    TmPacketDataLink 
    TmSink
    Used by the TmPacketProviders to propagate packets inside Yamcs.
  • Classes in org.yamcs.tctm used by org.yamcs.tctm.pus 
    Class and Description
    PacketPreprocessor
    The packet preprocessor is responsible for extracting basic information required for yamcs packet processing: - packet generation time - packet acquisition time - sequence count It is assumed that the (generation time, sequence count) uniquely identify the packet.
